phrases.original: To pre-authorize a disciple to become a new user, please complete the form below. This will send them a brief message about the app, and that message will contain a clickable authorization link. Once they click on the link, they will be pre-approved to register and will have full access to the app.
phrases.translated: To pre-authorize a disciple to become a new user, please complete the form below. This will send them a brief message about the app, and that message will contain a clickable authorization link. Once they click on the link, they will be pre-approved to register and will have full access to the app.

phrases.original: Every user of the Invites App must be verified as a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches, and must be committed to an accurate understanding of scripture.
phrases.translated: Every user of the Invites App must be verified as a member in good standing with the International Christian Churches, and must be committed to an accurate understanding of scripture.

phrases.original: This is important because all church events are added into the app by the users themselves. If authorization were not practiced, hypothetically a non-disciple could register, and could use the app to add events that promote outside churches and/or unsound doctrines.
phrases.translated: This is important because all church events are added into the app by the users themselves. If authorization were not practiced, hypothetically a non-disciple could register, and could use the app to add events that promote outside churches and/or unsound doctrines.

phrases.original: This is a WhatsApp phone number
phrases.translated: This is a WhatsApp phone number

phrases.original: I hereby vouch that {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.
phrases.translated: I hereby vouch that {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.

phrases.original: I hereby vouch that the above person is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.
phrases.translated: I hereby vouch that the above person is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive a text message about the Invites App.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive a text message about the Invites App.

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive a WhatsApp message about the Invites App.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive a WhatsApp message about the Invites App.

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive an e-mail about the Invites App.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} is expecting to receive an e-mail about the Invites App.

phrases.original: New user must be in the same church as me ({CHURCH-NAME}).
phrases.translated: New user must be in the same church as me ({CHURCH-NAME}).

phrases.original: User's mobile phone number is required
phrases.translated: User's mobile phone number is required

phrases.original: A valid phone number is required.
phrases.translated: A valid phone number is required.

phrases.original: A valid e-mail address is required.
phrases.translated: A valid e-mail address is required.

phrases.original: You must vouch for the new user.
phrases.translated: You must vouch for the new user.

phrases.original: The new user must be expecting to receive this message.
phrases.translated: The new user must be expecting to receive this message.

phrases.original: The Invites App:  You are invited to register!
phrases.translated: The Invites App:  You are invited to register!

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.

phrases.original: It's {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME}. I'm inviting you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.
phrases.translated: It's {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME}. I'm inviting you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.

phrases.original: The Invites App lets you share your faith quickly and conveniently, by sending a digital invitation. It helps the people you share with to remember and find the events that you invite them to.
phrases.translated: The Invites App lets you share your faith quickly and conveniently, by sending a digital invitation. It helps the people you share with to remember and find the events that you invite them to.

phrases.original: If you decide to register, please do so by {DEADLINE-DATE}.
phrases.translated: If you decide to register, please do so by {DEADLINE-DATE}.

phrases.original: Unable to send text message. Please try a different sending method.
phrases.translated: Unable to send text message. Please try a different sending method.

phrases.original: Please ask {FIRST-NAME} to click on the link within the message. The link will expire after one month.
phrases.translated: Please ask {FIRST-NAME} to click on the link within the message. The link will expire after one month.

phrases.original: Please ask {FIRST-NAME} to click on the Full Details button within the message.
phrases.translated: Please ask {FIRST-NAME} to click on the Full Details button within the message.
